name: Self-Service Voxel Mage
description:
This is a small game i made in around 13 hours for the Compo Ludum Dare 46 where you have to make a game completely from scratch in under 48 hours. I used less time since i started late, that's the main reason behind the low amount of levels. I still think that you might enjoy it.

Arrows or WASD to move

Space to Shoot

I didn't have time to make a proper soundtrack so i made some cool relaxing Snake Jazz (Rick and Morty inspiration there)

The project folder is also insede
